item.title: Gold hit a record and silver’s at a 14-year high — this Wall Street bank says two other commodities will join the party
item.description: Gold and silver prices were soaring on Monday. Citigroup strategists see the bull market continuing, with two other commodities poised to surge next.

item.title: ‘I’ve received conflicting advice’: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
item.description: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”

item.title: Brain drain? How Wall Street is reacting to $100,000 charge for H1-B visas
item.description: New Trump administration rules that will require a $100,000 fee for a type of visa used extensively in the technology industry brought fears of an exo...

item.title: ‘My grief makes decisions difficult’: My daughter has a financially reckless spouse. How do I protect her?
item.description: “I am afraid they will end up destitute and homeless.”

item.title: U.S. stock futures dip after Friday’s record highs, even as ‘the market has learned to thrive in ambiguity’
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed on Sunday, after the three major indexes all closed at record highs on Friday.
